name: @ts-stack/markdown
description: A full-featured markdown parser and compiler, written in TypeScript
author: Костя Третяк <ktretiak.in.ua@gmail.com>

scripts.test: rimraf dist-test/* && tsc --project test && node dist-test/index.js && jasmine
scripts.compile: rimraf dist/* && tsc && rimraf dist-test/* && tsc --project test
scripts.compile-example: rimraf dist/* && tsc && rimraf dist-example/* && tsc --project examples-usage
scripts.watch: npm run compile && concurrently 'tsc -w' 'tsc -w --project test' 'tsc -w --project examples-usage'
